After 1000+ hours, what can really be said about this game. Apart from all the stereotypes, this game has become apart of my life. Gameplay wise, its pretty standard and it will have you screaming at your monitor as to why CT weapons are so dogshit. I've put in blood, sweat and tears and its given me friends and laughs, pain and suffering. On the business side, the Community Market is a way to make money. With an account of Â£800+ worth of items, I has become a side hustle for me. Overall, I am both proud and horrified to be apart of the CS community.
